full_summary:
## Canadian Coast Guard Vessel Storage Tender

### Title:
F6855-221258 - Storage of Canadian Coast Guard Vessel W G George

### Reference:
WS3908259573-Doc3945438975
Amendment: 0
Solicitation Number: WS3908259573
Publication Date: 2023-04-04
Closing Date: 2023-04-19T14:00:00
Modification Date: 2023-04-04
Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-05-01
Expected Contract End Date: N/A
Status: Expiré

### UN/SPSC Code:
78141802 - Vessel docking services
Description: Vessel docking and storage services

### RFP Details:
A request for proposal (RFP) was issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) to select a contractor for the storage of the CCGS W.G. George, a 52-foot "ARUN Class" Canadian Coast Guard Search and Rescue (SAR) lifeboat.

### General Requirements:
The successful bidder will be responsible for:
1. removing the CCGS W.G. George from the water and storing it in a secure facility;
2. potentially removing and storing up to two (2) additional ARUN class vessels, depending on operational requirements and CCG's request.

### Action Required:
Eligible bidders should refer to Part 2 – Bidder Instructions and Part 3 – Bid Preparation Instructions for detailed information on how to submit a bid. Bids must be submitted through CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and will be evaluatied based on the lowest price.

### Evaluation Criteria:
Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of price, with the lowest price being the selection criterion. Publication Date: 2023-04-04
## Contract Documentation
This RFP is available through CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba), and details on submitting a bid can be found in Part 2 - Bidder Instructions and Part 3 - Bid Preparation Instructions.

## Contact Information
Inquiries and bid submission requirements should be directed to:
Art Rice
SPAC/PSPC
art.rice@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
